title: RADS ERROR FIX!! 10-01-2015
body: I dont know why this works, but it does. It has worked for me and all my friends

replies.body:
This only solves the problem for some, and they are people who would have been experiencing problems elsewhere as well.

The use of smileys and incorrect grammar disturbs me.

This worked for me!
Thank you so much!
btw I live in Sydney

OH AWESOME THANKS THAT WORKED :D , i hope they get this fixed soon. Oh btw is there any down sides to not changing the settings to how they were?

WOW. This is incredible.
im not very tech savvy so i didnt know what i was doing and it was kinda scary XD
but this is really easy to do and worked instantly
It wasnt even a RADS error i was trying to fix

Yes, I've just changed my DNS to 8.8.8.8 and my patcher started up and patching. I think this is a ISP problem, as I've had a history of problems with TPG. Thank you for sharing! You are my {{item:3026}} 
Cheers
Holy mother of saurons ungodly nutsack. This actually worked. Thank you based god, you are truly a god amongst men.
